com.k2.Util.nullable

Class Null

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.k2.Util.nullable.Null

  • public class Null
extends java.lang.Object
    The Null utility provides methods for handling null values The Null class maintains a static map of Instances of objects that represent a Null value but are not actually null. Thus preventing calls to the methods of the 'null' value from throwing a NPE
    Author:
    simon

    • Method Detail

      • registerClass

        public static <C> C registerClass(Null.RegisterType rType,
                                  java.lang.Class<C> cls)
        This method cases the Null utility to generate a 'null' value for each of the given classes
        Type Parameters:
        C - The type of null instance value returned
        Parameters:
        rType - How to handle existing 'null' values when registering null values a given class
        cls - The class that should have a null instance registered with the Null utility
        Returns:
        The null instance representing null values for this class

      • registerClasses

        public static void registerClasses(java.lang.Class<?>... classes)
        Create and register null instances for each of the given classes
        Parameters:
        classes - The classes for which to register null instances

      • registerClasses

        public static void registerClasses(Null.RegisterType rType,
                                   java.lang.Class<?>... classes)
        Create and register null instances for each of the given classes using the given RegisterType
        Parameters:
        rType - The registration type
        classes - The classes for which to register a null value

      • registerEntities

        public static void registerEntities(java.lang.String... packageNames)
        Create and register null instances for all the Entity classes in the list of package names
        Parameters:
        packageNames - A list of package names to scan for classes for which to register null values

      • registerEntities

        public static void registerEntities(Null.RegisterType rType,
                                    java.lang.String... packageNames)
        Create and register null instances for all the Entity classes in the list of given packages
        Parameters:

      • isNull

        public static boolean isNull(java.lang.Object obj)
        Check whether the given object is null or represents a null value
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to check for null
        Returns:
        True if the object == null or if the object == the null instance
